00038 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS *************************/
00040 #define USEDI2CDEV      0
00041 
00042 /* Definition of internal register of SC16IS750/760 */
00043 #define IODIR           0x0A
00044 #define IOSTATE         0x0B
00045 #define IOCON           0x0E
00046 #define SLVADDR         (0x90>>1)
00047 #define REGS_ADDR(n) (n<<3)
00048 
00049 
00050 #if (USEDI2CDEV == 0)
00051 #define I2CDEV LPC_I2C0
00052 #elif (USEDI2CDEV == 2)
00053 #define I2CDEV LPC_I2C2
00054 #else
00055 #error "I2C device not defined!"
00056 #endif

00059 uint8_t menu1[] =
00060 "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00061 "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00062 "I2C demo \n\r"
00063 "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00064 "\t - Core: ARM Cortex-M3 \n\r"
00065 "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115.2 kbps \n\r"
00066 " Communicate with I2C function on SC16IS750/760 Demo Board\n\r"
00067 " Use IO function on SC16IS740/750/760 chip to turn ON/OFF LEDs\n\r"
00068 "Press '1' to turn ON LEDs, '2' to turn OFF LEDs \n\r"
00069 "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00070 uint8_t menu2[] = "Demo terminated! \n\r";

00072 /* Define array data with match data to set internal register value of SC16IS740/750/760 */
00073 uint8_t iocon_cfg[2] = {REGS_ADDR(IOCON), 0x00};
00074 uint8_t iodir_cfg[2] = {REGS_ADDR(IODIR), 0xFF};
00075 uint8_t iostate_cfg_0[2] = {REGS_ADDR(IOSTATE), 0x00};
00076 uint8_t iostate_cfg_1[2] = {REGS_ADDR(IOSTATE), 0xFF};

00091 #if (USEDI2CDEV == 0)
00092 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00093 /*********************************************************************/
00098 void I2C0_IRQHandler(void){
00099         // just call std int handler
00100         I2C_MasterHandler(I2CDEV);
00101         if (I2C_MasterTransferComplete(I2CDEV)){
00102                 complete = SET;
00103         }
00104 }
00105 #elif (USEDI2CDEV == 2)
00106 /*********************************************************************/
00111 void I2C2_IRQHandler(void){
00112         // just call std int handler
00113         I2C_MasterHandler(I2CDEV);
00114         if (I2C_MasterTransferComplete(I2CDEV)){
00115                 complete = SET;
00116         }
00117 }
00118 #endif
00119

00147 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00148 /*********************************************************************/
00153 int c_entry(void)
00154 {
00155         uint8_t tmpchar[2] = {0, 0};
00156         __IO FlagStatus exitflag;
00157         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00158         I2C_M_SETUP_Type transferCfg;
00159         uint8_t SC16IS_RegStat;
00160 
00161 #if (USEDI2CDEV == 0)
00162     /* Disable I2C0 interrupt */
00163     NVIC_DisableIRQ(I2C0_IRQn);
00164     /* preemption = 1, sub-priority = 1 */
00165     NVIC_SetPriority(I2C0_IRQn, ((0x01<<3)|0x01));
00166 #elif (USEDI2CDEV == 2)
00167     /* Disable I2C2 interrupt */
00168     NVIC_DisableIRQ(I2C2_IRQn);
00169     /* preemption = 1, sub-priority = 1 */
00170     NVIC_SetPriority(I2C2_IRQn, ((0x01<<3)|0x01));
00171 #endif
00172 
00173         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00174          * – 115200bps
00175          * – 8 data bit
00176          * – No parity
00177          * – 1 stop bit
00178          * – No flow control
00179          */
00180         debug_frmwrk_init();
00181 
00182         // print welcome screen
00183         print_menu();
00184 
00185         /*
00186          * Init I2C pin connect
00187          */
00188         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00189         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00190 #if (USEDI2CDEV == 0)
00191         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00192         PinCfg.Pinnum = 27;
00193         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00194         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00195         PinCfg.Pinnum = 28;
00196         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00197 #elif (USEDI2CDEV == 2)
00198         PinCfg.Funcnum = 2;
00199         PinCfg.Pinnum = 10;
00200         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00201         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00202         PinCfg.Pinnum = 11;
00203         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00204 #endif
00205 
00206         /* I2C block ------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00207         // Initialize I2C peripheral
00208         I2C_Init(I2CDEV, 100000);
00209 
00210         /* Enable I2C1 operation */
00211         I2C_Cmd(I2CDEV, ENABLE);
00212 
00213         // test
00214         complete = RESET;
00215         transferCfg.sl_addr7bit = SLVADDR;
00216         transferCfg.tx_data = NULL;
00217         transferCfg.tx_length = 0;
00218         transferCfg.rx_data = &SC16IS_RegStat;
00219         transferCfg.rx_length = 1;
00220         transferCfg.retransmissions_max = 2;
00221         I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV, &transferCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_INTERRUPT);
00222         while (complete == RESET);
00223 
00224         /* Configure SC16IS750 ---------------------------------------------------------- */
00225         /* First, send some command to reset SC16IS740 chip via I2C bus interface */
00226         complete = RESET;
00227         transferCfg.sl_addr7bit = SLVADDR;
00228         transferCfg.tx_data = (uint8_t *)iocon_cfg;
00229         transferCfg.tx_length = sizeof(iocon_cfg);
00230         transferCfg.rx_data = NULL;
00231         transferCfg.rx_length = 0;
00232         transferCfg.retransmissions_max = 2;
00233         I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV, &transferCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_INTERRUPT);
00234         while (complete == RESET);
00235 
00236         complete = RESET;
00237         transferCfg.sl_addr7bit = SLVADDR;
00238         transferCfg.tx_data = (uint8_t *)iodir_cfg;
00239         transferCfg.tx_length = sizeof(iodir_cfg);
00240         transferCfg.rx_data = NULL;
00241         transferCfg.rx_length = 0;
00242         transferCfg.retransmissions_max = 2;
00243         I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV, &transferCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_INTERRUPT);
00244         while (complete == RESET);
00245 
00246         complete = RESET;
00247         transferCfg.sl_addr7bit = SLVADDR;
00248         transferCfg.tx_data = (uint8_t *)iostate_cfg_0;
00249         transferCfg.tx_length = sizeof(iostate_cfg_0);
00250         transferCfg.rx_data = NULL;
00251         transferCfg.rx_length = 0;
00252         transferCfg.retransmissions_max = 2;
00253         I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV, &transferCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_INTERRUPT);
00254         while (complete == RESET);
00255 
00256 
00257         /* Validate value of SC16IS750 register ------------------------------------------ */
00258         /* This section will dump out value of register that set through I2C bus */
00259         complete = RESET;
00260         transferCfg.sl_addr7bit = SLVADDR;
00261         transferCfg.tx_data = NULL; //(uint8_t *)iocon_cfg;
00262         transferCfg.tx_length = 0;//1;
00263         transferCfg.rx_data = &SC16IS_RegStat;
00264         transferCfg.rx_length = 1;
00265         transferCfg.retransmissions_max = 2;
00266         I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV, &transferCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_INTERRUPT);
00267         while (complete == RESET);
00268 
00269         complete = RESET;
00270         transferCfg.sl_addr7bit = SLVADDR;
00271         transferCfg.tx_data = (uint8_t *)iodir_cfg;
00272         transferCfg.tx_length = 1;
00273         transferCfg.rx_data = &SC16IS_RegStat;
00274         transferCfg.rx_length = 1;
00275         transferCfg.retransmissions_max = 2;
00276         I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV, &transferCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_INTERRUPT);
00277         while (complete == RESET);
00278 
00279         complete = RESET;
00280         transferCfg.sl_addr7bit = SLVADDR;
00281         transferCfg.tx_data = (uint8_t *)iostate_cfg_0;
00282         transferCfg.tx_length = 1;
00283         transferCfg.rx_data = &SC16IS_RegStat;
00284         transferCfg.rx_length = 1;
00285         transferCfg.retransmissions_max = 2;
00286         I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV, &transferCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_INTERRUPT);
00287         while (complete == RESET);
00288 
00289 
00290         // Reset exit flag
00291         exitflag = RESET;
00292 
00293     /* Read some data from the buffer */
00294     while (exitflag == RESET){
00295 
00296         while((tmpchar[0] = _DG) == 0);
00297 
00298         if (tmpchar[0] == 27){
00299                         /* ESC key, set exit flag */
00300                         _DBG_(menu2);
00301                         exitflag = SET;
00302                 }
00303                 else if (tmpchar[0] == 'r'){
00304                         print_menu();
00305                 }
00306                 else{
00307                         if (tmpchar[0] == '1'){
00308                                 // LEDs are ON now...
00309                                 transferCfg.sl_addr7bit = SLVADDR;
00310                                 transferCfg.tx_data = (uint8_t *)iostate_cfg_0;
00311                                 transferCfg.tx_length = sizeof(iostate_cfg_0);
00312                                 transferCfg.rx_data = NULL;
00313                                 transferCfg.rx_length = 0;
00314                                 transferCfg.retransmissions_max = 2;
00315                                 if (I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV, &transferCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_POLLING) \
00316                                                 == ERROR){
00317                                         Error_Loop(transferCfg.status);
00318                                 }
00319                         }
00320                         else if (tmpchar[0] == '2')
00321                         {
00322                                 // LEDs are OFF now...
00323                                 transferCfg.sl_addr7bit = SLVADDR;
00324                                 transferCfg.tx_data = (uint8_t *)iostate_cfg_1;
00325                                 transferCfg.tx_length = sizeof(iostate_cfg_1);
00326                                 transferCfg.rx_data = NULL;
00327                                 transferCfg.rx_length = 0;
00328                                 transferCfg.retransmissions_max = 2;
00329                                 if (I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV, &transferCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_POLLING) \
00330                                                 == ERROR){
00331                                         Error_Loop(transferCfg.status);
00332                                 }
00333                         }
00334                         /* Then Echo it back */
00335                         _DBG_(tmpchar);
00336                 }
00337     }
00338 
00339     // wait for current transmission complete - THR must be empty
00340     while (UART_CheckBusy(LPC_UART0) == SET);
00341 
00342     // DeInitialize UART0 peripheral
00343     UART_DeInit(LPC_UART0);
00344     I2C_DeInit(I2CDEV);
00345 
00346     /* Loop forever */
00347     while(1);
00348     return 1;
00349 }
00350 
00351 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00352    allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00353    heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00354    toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00355    file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00356 int main(void)
00357 {
00358     return c_entry();
00359 }
